content: **crocheted large fruit and vegetable net in drops safran the piece is worked with lace pattern theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern e-343 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** width approx 19 cm measured flat height approx 34 cm measured flat without handle **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 18 off white 50 g colour 64 light beige 50 g colour 65 pistachio 50 g colour 56 powder pink weighs approx 30-35 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 24 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
